title: Seoul Live Updates: Witnesses Recall Terrifying Night as Officials Seek Cause of Deadly Crush
description: “I saw this sea of bodies come rushing toward us,” one woman said. The Halloween crowd surge in a nightlife district killed at least 151 people.
dc:creator: The New York Times
media:credit: Chang W. Lee/The New York Times
media:description: A man bowed to the memorial for the victims of stempede in Itaewon, Seoul, on Oct. 30th, 2022, in Seoul, South Korea.
